Sentencas: The fluorite-structured oxygen ion conductor gadolinium-doped cerium oxide (GDC) is preferred as an electrolyte for low- and medium-temperature solid oxide fuel cells over yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ).
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical performance of SOFC: GDC electrolyte grains encapsulation via DZSB film

Sentencas: However, GDC requires a higher sintering temperature which limits its application.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical performance of SOFC: GDC electrolyte grains encapsulation via DZSB film

Sentencas: To decrease its sintering temperature and enhance its conductivity at low and medium temperatures, a novel (Dy0.20Zr0.05Bi0.75)2O3-delta - Gd0.10Ce0.90O2-delta (xDZSB-GDC, x = 1,2,3,4,5, and10 wt%) nanocomposite is designed and prepared by solid-phase method.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical performance of SOFC: GDC electrolyte grains encapsulation via DZSB film

Sentencas: Microstructure and electrochemical characteristics of the DZSB-GDC composite are studied by X-ray diffraction (XRD), scanning electron microscopy (SEM), and alternating current (AC) impedance spectroscopy.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical performance of SOFC: GDC electrolyte grains encapsulation via DZSB film

Sentencas: DZSB effectively promotes the densification of the GDC electrolyte and reduces GDC's grain-boundary impedance.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical performance of SOFC: GDC electrolyte grains encapsulation via DZSB film

Sentencas: Theuniform distribution of DZSB around the GDC interface provided channels for ion transfer.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical performance of SOFC: GDC electrolyte grains encapsulation via DZSB film

Sentencas: Compared to the GDC electrolyte (1.30 x 10-3 S cm-1), the conductivity of 10 DZSB-GDC is six times higher at 550 degrees C (8.30 x 10-3 S cm-1).
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical performance of SOFC: GDC electrolyte grains encapsulation via DZSB film

Sentencas: DZSB at low oxygen partial pressure efficiently inhibits the electronic conduction of GDC and boosts the open-circuit voltage of the single cell.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical performance of SOFC: GDC electrolyte grains encapsulation via DZSB film

Sentencas: At 750 degrees C, the maximum output power of a 10DZSB-GDC electrolyte-supported single cell is 364 mWcm- 2, greater than 1.75 times the power density of a GDCsupported cell.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical performance of SOFC: GDC electrolyte grains encapsulation via DZSB film

Sentencas: These findings indicate thatDZSB-GDC is a promising electrolyte material for solid oxide fuel cells.
Titulo: Enhanced electrochemical performance of SOFC: GDC electrolyte grains encapsulation via DZSB film
